subject: temporary mirror outage
body:
due to longer lasting than expected works on the building mirror
freedom.dicea.unifi.it will be operating from an alternate site until 1
june 2007, so no regular mirror service is expected until that date.


--
Leonardo Boselli


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
